1653440.name: Power of the Ancients Demo
1653440.description:
A peaceful pixely isometric city builder with strategy elements.

Construct a pyramid as the center of your realm.
Four different people live in the four quadrants of the pyramid.
Fishermen, farmers, fire people, magicians.

Gather resources, build homes for them and create a thriving city while preparing for harvest as winter approaches.

DEMO: may not include all gameplay elements.

Influences: The Settlers, Civilization, Dwarf Fortress
